summary: App to help Madelyn track Girl Scout collections: books (by year and name), patches, uniforms (optionally with photos), and tins.

existing_features.title: Add a frontend UI with clear separate sections for Books, Patches, and Uniforms, plus an optional 'All Items' view that shows everything with a category label.
Provide forms to add, edit, and delete items in each category, with validation appropriate to the category (e.g., Books require name and year).
Add photo support so a user can attach at least one photo to an item (book/patch/uniform) and view it in the item details.
Add collection browsing utilities: search by name/title, filter by category, and basic sorting for lists (including Books by year).
Use a cohesive, creative visual theme suitable for a Girl Scout collection tracker (avoid blue/purple), applying consistent typography, spacing, and component styling across all pages.
Personalize the app UI with the name "Madelyn" where appropriate (e.g., header greeting), without requiring any additional user profile setup.
Generate and render a small set of static UI images (logo/empty-state) as local frontend assets in frontend/public/assets/generated, and use them in the UI.
Add a new "Tins" section to the frontend category tabs (including All Items) so users can browse tin items separately.
Update collection querying/state so the app fetches and displays tin items, consistent with how books/patches/uniforms are loaded (including loading/error handling).
Update the item add form and item details/card rendering to support tins as a selectable category, including appropriate labels and category styling.

new_feature_requests.summary: Track Girl Scout books collection with fields for name and year.
Track collected Girl Scout uniforms and accessories.
Create a collection-tracking data model and persistence layer to store Girl Scout items in three categories: Books (tracked by year and name), Patches, and Uniforms (including accessories).
Implement backend APIs for listing and searching the collection, including filtering by category (Books, Patches, Uniforms) and sorting Books by year and then name.
Add a new collection section/category to track Girl Scout tins.
Extend the backend item category model to support a new Girl Scout tins category, and ensure existing query APIs (listItems, filterByCategory, sortBooksByYear) continue to work with the new category.
